dublin_core.dcvalue: The prevalence of genital chlamydial infection is increasing in Norway The condition is usually asymptomatic and screening seems to be the best way of finding infected persons Our aim was to establish the prevalence of genital chlamydial infection among senior high school pupils in a Norwegian municipality and to link individual results with information on sexual behaviour
Tidsskrift for den Norske lægeforening : tidsskrift for praktisk medicin, ny række
[Genital Chlamydia among pupils in high school].
